Machine Learning

A comprehensive guide to machine learning created by Soroush Nasiriany, Garrett Thomas, William Wang, and Alex Yang for CS 189 at UC Berkeley, sharing knowledge with students and the general public.

Key Concepts:

  • Comprehensive course guide
  • Machine learning curriculum
  • Notation and terminology
  • extracting relationships from data
  • recovery of unknown function
  • approximation of true relationship
  • cost function optimization
Machine Learning CS 189 UC Berkeley machine learning regression function approximation dataset hypothesis class parametric model
